ex2

Class Ex2

  • java.lang.Object
    • ex2.Ex2

  • public class Ex2
extends java.lang.Object
    This program reads from an input file a list of URL, and for each URL read the html and insert into a database statistics about the number of images in each page. Finally the program reads and summarize the inserted data in the form of: "http://www.cnn.com: 20" "http://www.google.com: 1"
    Version:
    7.7.7
    Author:
    Andrey Shamis AND Ilia Gaysinksy

      • getHtmlAsStringFromURL

        public static java.lang.String getHtmlAsStringFromURL(java.lang.String url)
                                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Function for download web page content located on interntet and can be finded by URL link given in paramter. The function download the content put into string end return the string.
        Parameters:
        url - of Internet site(WEB page).
        Returns:
        whole HTML page in string form
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - On BufferedReader error.
        java.net.MalformedURLException - On URL error.
        java.lang.Exception

      • howManyIMGsAtGivenHTMLstr

        public static int howManyIMGsAtGivenHTMLstr(java.lang.String htmlStr)
        Count number of images in given HTML string
        Parameters:
        htmlStr - is string that content HTML file.
        Returns:
        Number of images founded in given HTML string
